name: travel_delays
rows: Roadwork on PA 12 eastbound between Exit: RIVER ROAD and Exit: PA 61 SOUTH - CENTRE AVE. All lanes now open.
Crash on PA 153 both directions between WARING RD and CLOVER HILL RD. There is a traffic disruption.
Roadwork on OLD WEST CREEK RD both directions at BUCKTAIL TRAIL HW. All lanes now open.
Utility work on I-476 southbound 1.4 miles north of Exit 9: PA 3 - UPPER DARBY/BROOMALL. All lanes now open.
Utility work on I-476 northbound 1.9 miles north of Exit 9: PA 3 - BROOMALL/UPPER DARBY. All lanes now open.
Moving roadwork on I-90 eastbound .3 miles west of Exit 41: PA 89 - NORTH EAST. There is a lane restriction.
Utility work on US 222 both directions between EASTERN INDUSTRIES, QUARRY RD and LONG LN. All lanes now open.

Roadwork on US 30 eastbound between Exit: PA 462 - WRIGHTSVILLE and Exit: PA 441 - COLUMBIA/MARIETTA. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on PA 147 northbound at Exit: TO US 15 NORTH. There is a shoulder closed.

Roadwork on I-376 eastbound 2 miles west of Exit 84A: PA 48 SOUTH - MONROEVILLE. There is a lane restriction.

Utility work on E GRACEVILLE RD / BREEZEWOOD RD / MOUNTAIN CHAPEL RD both directions between BREEZEWOOD RD and LINCOLN HW. There is a traffic disruption.
Traffic is temporarily stopped on I-76 West at Allegheny Tunnel, due to an incident within the tunnel. Be alert for stopped traffic and expect delays through the area.

Utility work on CHANEYSVILLE RD / CHERRY LN both directions between CLEAR RIDGE RD and 1 miles SOUTH of TOWNSHIP 390 RT. There is a traffic disruption.
Ramp from US 11 to I-76 closed. Use alternate route.
Incident on Ramp from I-76 to US 11. Expect delays.
Utility work on BREEZEWOOD RD both directions between LINCOLN HW and BREEZEWOOD RD, MOUNTIAN CHAPEL RD. There is a traffic disruption.
Utility work on LOG TAVERN RD westbound between GENESIS DR and POCONO MT WATER FOREST RD. There is a lane restriction.
